title: Subnetting Basics
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Dividing a network into smaller sub-networks. 
**Subnet Mask**: Defines which part of IP is Network and which is Host. (e.g., 255.255.255.0 /24). 
**CIDR**: Classless Inter-Domain Routing (Standard now).

interview_questions.question: How many hosts in /24?
interview_questions.answer: 256 - 2 = 254. (One for Network ID, One for Broadcast).

real_world_use_cases.description: Cloud networks require precise subnet planning.
